Package GameObjects

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObjects.GameObject
      • GameObjects.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BasicGameSpirit, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<GameObject>
    public class Player
extends GameObject
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Packman object of type GameObject with image of pacman, starting width and height of 30px each.
    Its position represented in geodetic coordinates Lat,Lon and alt, and also have speed and eating radius.
    GameObject is from type of BasicGameSpirit for the ability of being converted into a GameSpirit for use of drawing on screen in X,Y pixel coordinates.
    please use a BasicGameSpiritFactory for creating GameSpirits from an GameObject.
    default sprite image location (relative): "GameData\\PACMAN.png"

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Player​(double lat, double lon, double alt, int id, double speed, double radius)
      [Constructor]
      Creating a new pacman with new values of Position (Lat, lon and alt), id (Preferbly to be generated by Game object with Game.generateID()), be careful as the Game object using SET for its data structure, and comparing by ID, if two game objects have the same id, one of them will be deleted.
      Player​(int id)
      [Constructor] creates an empty Object with default values, must supply id from Game.generateID.

      • Player

        public Player​(double lat,
              double lon,
              double alt,
              int id,
              double speed,
              double radius)
        [Constructor]
        Creating a new pacman with new values of Position (Lat, lon and alt), id (Preferbly to be generated by Game object with Game.generateID()), be careful as the Game object using SET for its data structure, and comparing by ID, if two game objects have the same id, one of them will be deleted.
        Movement speed (in meters), and eating radius (in meters).
        Parameters:
        lat - - latitude.
        lon - - longitude.
        alt - - altitude
        id - - ID.
        speed - - speed in meters.
        radius - - eating radius in meters

      • Player

        public Player​(int id)
        [Constructor] creates an empty Object with default values, must supply id from Game.generateID. lat = 0, lon = 0, alt = 0, speed = 1, radius = 1.
